CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("http://localhost:47280/SalesforceAPI.aspx?UserAccount="& $User.Username &"&Destination="&MobilePhone&"&LeadId="&Id,"Click here to call this lead with 3CX (MobilePhone)")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Clicking this link will launch a call to this lead's mobile phone and connect it to your phone
CustomField.label: Call mobile phone via 3CX
